title: Bank
description: Developed an end-to-end backend solution for a banking application using Golang, Gin, Docker, Kubernetes, and AWS, incorporating JWT authentication and RESTful APIs for secure transactions and scalability.

title: Indian Sign Language Detection, IIT Jammu
description: Created an advanced Indian Sign Language Detection system with TensorFlow and Keras to identify gestures, integrated into a Flask web application, facilitating communication for the hearing-impaired.

title: Book Store
description: Built a fully functional Book Store web application with React.js, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB, offering seamless inventory management, user authentication, and a robust REST API.
